pages.title: Description
pages.text: The Demon is a ruthless killer who uses fire as it's favorite toy. $(br)Locations:§1 Dead Zone, Nether §1Wastes$(br)Variants:§1 N/A $(br)Size:§1 1.5x scale $(br)Weapon: §1N/A$(br)Hostility:§1 Hostile; unless §1wearing Demon Armor $(br)Health:§1 10,000 $(br)Damage:§1 150 $(br)Tier:§1 3
